TestCase.TestCaseObjective: BSO validation. Test whether the Producer/Provider is able to create and update the geometry information of an IED discovery IEDEvent and the Consumers/Receivers are able to understand (and display) it correctly.
TestCase.TestCaseScenario: The Producer creates an IED discovery IEDEvent with GeometricDefinition Sub-Type = Circle. The Consumers receive the information and interpret it correctly. The Producer updates the geometry information of this IEDEvent and the Sub-Type itself to Sphere. The Consumers receive the information and interpret it correctly.
TestCase.TestCaseEnvironment: Internet or Co-located. Exchange Pattern: R/R, P/S.
TestCase.TestCasePreCondition: The Producer/Provider has created a topic which includes message elements belonging to the Event message schema area. The Consumers have subscribed to this topic.
TestCase.TestCaseConclusion: This test is considered a success if the IEDEvent and its geometry information is processed and interpreted correctly on all Nations' C2IS.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction:
The Producer (1) creates an IEDEvent with name XXX_IEDG_921 and with the following geometry information: * IncidentCode = 'IEDDiscovery' * GeometricDefinition Sub-Type = Circle (with at least its Centre and Radius Elements specified)
Notices: XXX in name of the object is meant (in principle) to be replaced by the 3 letter code of the country name. Example for the name of the IEDEvent: GBR_ IEDG_921.
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: Consumers (2) receive and display the IEDEvent correctly.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: The Producer (1) updates the IEDEvent with the following geometry information: * GeometricDefinition Sub-Type = Sphere (Centre and Radius Elements are also updated)
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: Consumers (2) receive and display the IEDEvent correctly.
